title: Hilary Duff's fiance Matthew Koma calls her his 'wife'
text:
Matthew Koma set the rumor mill rolling when he shared a black and white snap of his fiancee Hilary Duff at the top of a spiral staircase that he captioned simply, 'wife.'

The two have been engaged for five months and share a nearly one-year-old daughter together.

There have been no reports that the two have wed in secret so the musician may have just been thinking about the future when she will one day become Mrs Hilary Koma.

is she or isn't she?: Matthew Koma caused consternation when he posted this Instagram snap of fiance Hilary Duff 'wife' on Saturday

Hilary has yet to comment on her rocker beau's description of her, or whether they snuck off to tie the knot.

The 32-year-old actress positively glowed in the photo that showed her in a mini-dress with a deeply plunging neckline.

Her blonde tresses were slicked back and she carried a small silver purse that matched her silver high-heeled pumps.

Earlier she shared a color shot of them all poshed up for the 2019 Baby Ball in Hollywood on Saturday, captioned: 'We like each other.'

Smiling stars: Hilary has yet to comment on her rocker beau's description of her as 'wife' but she posted a sweet shot of them before the Baby Ball, captioned 'We like each other'

'Lol not what you said yesterday,' Matthew, also 32, jokingly shot back in the comments.

The Baby Ball is the annual celebration of #worldadoptionday put on by AdoptTogether to raise funds for families trying to come up with the money to adopt.

Meanwhile, the happy couple, who announced their engagement in May, share 11-month-old daughter Banks.

Funny reply: Rocker Matthew, 32, was quick to post his comment on the photo joking, ' lol not what you said yesterday'; seen on Sunday in LA

'lol not what you said yesterday,' Matthew, also 32, jokingly shot back in the comments.

The Baby Ball is the annual celebration of #worldadoptionday put on by AdoptTogether to raise funds for families trying to come up with the money to adopt.

Meanwhile, the happy couple, who announced their engagement in May, share 11-month-old daughter Banks.

And Hilary also shares son Luca, seven, with her ex-husband, retired pro ice hockey player Mike Comrie, who hails from Canada.

They got together in 2007 and were married from 2010 to 2016 before calling it quits.

But she and Mike remain amicable exes for Luca's sake.
description: The 32-year-old rocker set the rumor mill rolling on Saturday when he referred to his fiancee, also 32, as 'wife' in a B&W photo of her he shared. She has yet to  comment on his description of her.
